name: Quest of Jewels
description: Our story begins with two jewels, one light, meant to represent life and creation, the other dark, to represent death and decay. Both crystals are protected by a dragon, the light crystal protected by the dragon Elri, and the dark protected by Cethe. These jewels have, in turn, spawned other jewels that contain powers of their own. Humanity has, over time, learned to harness the power of the jewels, leading to a new age of magic. However, there were those who found themselves dissatisfied with the power they had been given and sought the power of Elri and Cethe’s jewels. One day, an army of humans manages to encroach on Cethe’s domain, and in the battle, the dark jewel is shattered, and its pieces scattered about the world, corrupting wherever they land. However, the Leader of the human army, managed to procure one of the shards before they scattered, amassing great power in the process.
